snippet: Again and again in her political career, Mrs. Clinton has been given political cover by Republicans who cannot stop themselves from overreaching.
abstract: Controversial statements made by Republican presidential candidates are aiding Hillary Rodham Clinton as she seeks to diver attention from issues that have weighed down her candidacy over summer; polls have shown Clinton struggling to address concerns about her honesty and electability, but her forceful responses to her Republican rivals have reassured some voters.
lead_paragraph: Again and again in her political career, Mrs. Clinton has been given political cover by Republicans who cannot stop themselves from overreaching.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Uses G.O.P.’s Words to Aid Her Arguments
headline.print_headline: Clinton Uses G.O.P.’s Words to Aid Her Arguments
